contents:
CNN還真報導了。G/O Media系極左傳媒集體失聲。Texas Church Shooting雖...

贴一些CNN新闻底下的回复（https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TWpv2smbAyU）

Remember to appreciate first responders, paramedics, nurses and doctors.
Good job to the person with a firearm who stopped him.

Simple fact: 5 Armed citizens saved lives with guns way before Police could arrive.

Good guy with Gun should be the headline

Watched the video on liveleak, 10+ armed citizens were ready for combat. Well played Texas.

Good guy with a gun ❤️🇺🇸 imagine how many would've died waiting on police
